edu.thu.keg.mdap.provider

Interface DataProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataProvider, HiveProvider, JdbcProvider

    public interface DataProvider
    Represents a data provider storing datasets. Can be a SQL database, Hive, HDFS files, etc.. A DataProvider object is uniquely identified by a Connection String
    Author:
    Yuanchao Ma

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
      Close a connection of a ResultSet generated by this provider.
      java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.lang.String query)
      Run a query against the dataset and return ResultSet
      java.lang.String getConnectionString() 
      java.sql.ResultSet queryDataSet(DataSet ds)
      Query the data provider the get the ResultSet of a dataset.

    • Method Detail

      • executeQuery

        java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.lang.String query)
                                throws DataProviderException
        Run a query against the dataset and return ResultSet
        Parameters:
        query - the query string returning a table
        Returns:
        the disconnected ResultSet returned by the query.
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - when the query is invalid, or communication with the provider returns a error.

      • queryDataSet

        java.sql.ResultSet queryDataSet(DataSet ds)
                                throws DataProviderException
        Query the data provider the get the ResultSet of a dataset. Default implementation is calling executeQuery on the query statement of the dataset.
        Parameters:
        ds - the dataset whose contents (ResultSet) are expected
        Returns:
        the disconnected ResultSet of the dataset
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - when the DataSet (with its name) does not exist on the DataProvider, or communication with the provider returns a error.

      • getConnectionString

        java.lang.String getConnectionString()
        Returns:
        The connection string of this DataProvider

      • closeResultSet

        void closeResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
                    throws DataProviderException
        Close a connection of a ResultSet generated by this provider.
        Parameters:
        rs -
        Throws:
        DataProviderException
